name: Chinese Chess Panda Premium (Co Tuong / Xiangqi / 象棋)
name_original: Chinese Chess Panda Premium (Co Tuong / Xiangqi / 象棋)
description:
Xiangqi (象棋) also called Chinese chess, is a strategy board game for two players. It is one of the most popular board games in China and Vietnam, and is in the same family as Western (or international) chess.

The game represents a battle between two armies, with the object of capturing the enemy's general.

Chinese Chess Panda brings this great game to your iPhone/iPad. You can enjoy Chinese Chess in family game time, or you can also enjoy the game by playing with the AIs of varying difficulties. Beware that it is very challenging to beat the best AI in this game!

You will also gain experience points by winning against the AIs (+1 for Easy, +3 for Medium and +5 for Hard).

Features:
* Undo
* Save/load unfinished game
* AIs with three levels of difficulties
* Timer based game

This is the premium, ads-free version with the support for unlimited undo in a game.
